thread.title: Signalling problems causing delays for commuters | Meridian
thread.title_full: Signalling problems causing delays for commuters | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Signalling problems causing delays for commuters | Meridian
text:
Owing to a signalling problem between Warwick and Banbury Chiltern Railways will be running a heavily reduced service this morning with one train per hour towards London and Birmingham.
Speed restrictions will be in place in the Leamington Spa area with delays of approximately 20 to 30 minutes.
Chiltern Railways tickets are valid on Virgin Trains West Coast and London Midland services between Birmingham New Street and London Euston, and intermediate stations en route.
Tickets are also being accepted on First Great Western services into London via Oxford and Reading.
Chiltern services will be subject to short notice alterations, cancellations and delays
Last updated Wed 26 Aug 2015 Travel Oxfordshire Berkshire
